page.title: 16HEALTH CARE.
page.content: There are two doctors working at the clinic at Bellingham,one of whom has been here for 12 years.A new clinic has recently been built which means that more than more than one consultation can take place at the same time.The clinic has also provided more work in the area. The practice is involved in the {Tynedale Accident Service}which was set up to cope with accidents,and means that if an accident occurs,the nearest available doctor will go to the scene.The practice also has a health visitor who visits children at home for routine advice and is available for help with any problems. There are now 12 people working at the clinic,including trainee nurses and medical students.The doctors envisage no major changes in the structure of health care in the Bellingham area.
